'''Teardrop Crystal''' is a [[Quest Item]] that can be obtained by completing the {{Quest|Hidden Tears}}.

After being purified, it is used to [[Completely Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel|completely repair]] the [[Partially Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel]] during the {{Quest|Crystal Tears}}.
